name: 8th International Academic Conference on Education
content: The worldâ€™s leading academics, scholars, and researchers pick the 8th International Academic Conference on Education for a reason. Taking place in Oxford, United Kingdom on August 23-25, 2024, the international education conference 2024 will host the international community of educators, representatives of non-profit and government organizations, and other stakeholders to discuss such topics as adult education, pedagogy, ICT, inclusive education, and more. We invite the international community to take an active role in shaping the future of education. Share your research findings, exchange ideas with fellow academic members, expand your network, and get inspired.
